definition: Xinhua county in Loudi 婁底|娄底[Lou2 di3], Hunan
abbr. for Xinjiang 新疆[Xin1 jiang1] or Singapore 新加坡[Xin1 jia1 po1]/surname Xin
to make into/to change into/-ization/to ... -ize/to transform/abbr. for 化學|化学[hua4 xue2]

sentences.english: Xinhua county in Hunan province is one of the poorest counties in China.
sentences.chinese: 湖南省新化縣是我國最貧困的縣之一。
